_title: IRB 7710 and IRB 7720 Industrial Robots Technical Documentation

properties.dcterms:title: IRB 7710 and IRB 7720 Industrial Robots Technical Documentation
properties.dcterms:description: Document detailing the features, specifications, and applications of ABB's IRB 7710 and IRB 7720 industrial robots, including modular design, energy efficiency, and performance metrics.
properties.dcat:keyword: industrial robots, modular design, energy efficiency, high precision, automotive, logistics, OmniCore, LeanID
properties.dcat:contactPoint: ABB AG, Division Robotics, Grüner Weg 6, 61169 Friedberg, Telefon: +49 6031 85-0, E-Mail: robotics@de.abb.com
properties.creator: ABB AG

properties.performanceMetrics: 0,6 mm path accuracy at 1600 mm/s, 30% energy savings, 25% cycle time reduction
properties.conditionsOfOperation: +5°C bis +50°C, max. 95% relative humidity, max. 72 dB (A) noise level
